abstract: Amid intense lobbying, Microsoft is expected to squeak out a victory this week to have its open document format, Office Open XML, recognized as an international standard.
snippet: Amid intense lobbying, Microsoft is expected to squeak out a victory this week to have its open document format, Office Open XML, recognized as an international standard.
lead_paragraph: BERLIN, Sept. 3  Amid intense lobbying, Microsoft is expected to squeak out a victory this week to have its open document format, Office Open XML, recognized as an international standard, people tracking the vote said Monday.

headline.main: Microsoft Favored to Win Open Document Vote
headline.print_headline: Microsoft Favored to Win Open Document Vote

abstract: The company’s Office Open XML document fails to meet two criteria for a standards designation.
snippet: The company’s Office Open XML document fails to meet two criteria for a standards designation.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft’s bid to extend its dominance in digital documents to the new field of open-format documents was unexpectedly rebuffed today when a global technical panel refused to designate its Office Open XML as an international standard.

headline.main: Microsoft Is Rebuffed by Standards Body

abstract: School kids aren’t the only ones returning from vacation. Dog-eared speculation about a potential deal between Yahoo and Microsoft is back as well.
lead_paragraph: School kids aren’t the only ones returning from vacation. Dog-eared speculation about a potential deal between Yahoo and Microsoft is back as well.

abstract: An analyst’s report has given new life to the speculation about an acquisition of Yahoo by Microsoft.
snippet: An analyst’s report has given new life to the speculation about an acquisition of Yahoo by Microsoft.
lead_paragraph: School kids aren’t the only ones returning from vacation. Dog-eared speculation about a potential deal between Yahoo and Microsoft is back as well.
